ruleContent.content:
(() => { let html = ''; try { var plist = java.getElements('div.text_row_txt@p'); for (var i = 0; i < plist.length; i++) { var eleDList = java.getElements('div.text_row_txt@p.' + i + '@d'); let dsort = []; for (let j = 0; j < eleDList.length; j++) { let eled = eleDList[j]; let index = parseInt(java.getString('div.text_row_txt@p.' + i + '@d.' + j + '@data-index')); dsort[index] = java.getString('div.text_row_txt@p.' + i + '@d.' + j + '@text'); } html += '

' + dsort.join('') + '

'; } } catch (e) { // 当返回结果为字符串时 return '' + e; } return html; })()
